sentence.Network_en: We use the term bandwidth to represent such a frequency range.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们用频带宽度这个词来代表这样的频率范围.

sentence.Network_en: The information content is then proportional to the bandwidth of the imposed variation.
sentence.Network_cn: 此时信息容量正比于所载入的变化的带宽.

sentence.Network_en: This system has the advantages of large range, bandwidth and good repeatability.
sentence.Network_cn: 该系统具有大量程 、 宽频带、重复性好的特点.

entry.def: A bandwidth is the range of frequencies used for a particular telecommunications signal, radio transmission, or computer network.

means.word_mean: 1. a data transmission rate; the maximum amount of information (bits/second) that can be transmitted along a channel
